phone.label: Phone Number
phone.description: Please enter your Telegram phone number.
phone.descriptionBan: Telegram's automatic protection has been triggered and your account has been banned. This is a one-time error, it will not happen again after recovering.

code.label: Code
code.auth.sentCodeTypeApp: We have sent you a message with the code at the Telegram app.
code.auth.sentCodeTypeSms:
We have sent you an SMS
 with the code.
code.auth.sentCodeTypeCall: You will receive an automatic call with a synthesized voice which tell you a verification code.
code.auth.sentCodeTypeFlashCall: You will receive an automatic call with a synthesized voice which tell you a verification code.

Your account is protected with a
 2FA-Password
